name: Porsche 919 Hybrid Evo
description:
Protech P91 Hybrid Evo by Race Sim Studio.

Featuring a cutting-edge hybrid powertrain, the P91 Hybrid Evo boasts a 2.0-liter V4 turbocharged engine and two energy recovery systems that generate electricity from the brakes and exhaust gases. With a total power output of over 1,100 horsepower*, this racing machine is capable of reaching awe-inspiring speeds of up to 230 mph (370 km/h).

In 2018, the real-world counterpart set a new lap record at the legendary Nurburgring Nordschleife racetrack in Germany, completing a full lap in just 5:19.55 minutes on a lap that wasn't pushing the car to its limits. This impressive feat showcases the car's incredible speed and handling capabilities, cementing its place as one of the most formidable vehicles in the world of motorsports.

*Total combined power of 1160hp.

Weight includes the driver.
author: Race Sim Studio
